Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: சொல்லுக சொல்லைப் பிறிதோர்சொல் அச்சொல்லை வெல்லுஞ்சொல் இன்மை அறிந்து.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: Speak out your speech, when once 'tis past dispute That none can utter speech that shall your speech refute.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A powerful orator is speaking. Their words are not ephemeral; they are manifesting physically as solid, perfectly forged, diamond-like crystals.
Layered_Composition.Midground: Opposing speakers are trying to refute these words. They are launching their own words, visualized as ordinary, blunt, wooden arrows, against the crystal words.
Layered_Composition.Background: The wooden arrows of the opponents are shown shattering uselessly against the unbreakable, diamond-like words of the main speaker. This demonstrates that the speaker has chosen their words knowing that no counter-argument can defeat them ('வெல்லுஞ்சொல் இன்மை அறிந்து').

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: One should speak only after having formulated an argument that is so strong and true that no other word can possibly defeat it.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The speaker's words as indestructible diamonds is the key metaphor. The opponents' words as shattering wooden arrows provides the dramatic contrast and proves the speaker's invincibility.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The diamond words are the main source of light, glowing with an unbreakable, white brilliance and refracting light everywhere. The opponents and their wooden arrows are in shadow.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A dynamic shot that captures the impact of the weak words shattering against the strong ones.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, with cinematic effects for the shattering arrows and the crystalline words.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: High-contrast lighting that emphasizes the strength of the speaker's argument.

Cultural_Anchors: The power of irrefutable logic and truth.

Negative_Prompt: diamond words shattering, wooden arrows piercing through, text artifacts.

Hyperparameters.seed: Explore variations for the diamond word structures.
